0.title: Home Island
0.description: The place where it all began; home sweet home.

1.title: Murky Depths
1.description: The refreshing warmness of the ocean gives way to dark, cold waters in this region. A sense of dread looms over you.

2.title: The Floating City
2.description: A sight all too rare on the open waters - a civilization. The smell of freshly baked fish and the laughter of its citizen fills the air.

3.title: Desolate Raft
3.description: An abandoned, rundown shack leaning on the water. It looks as if it will collapse at any moment.

4.title: Hostile Earth
4.description: Jagged rocks cut in and out of the water at will. Their movement is lifelike, yet you know them to be not so.
